author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
92x PR of L1T Muon development

Contains code from l1t-integration brach tags v94.0, v95.3, v95.4, & v94.1.
 - BMTF: improved eta assignment leading to 50% better resolution w.r.t. GEN. (tags v94.0, v95.3, v95.4) Corrected LUTs requested as externals cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TMuon/pull/11.
- New uGMT extrapolation LUTs 20170505. These take the BMTF eta scale fix into account. This needs the external Muons data. (tag v94.1) LUTs reqeusted as externals.  cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TMuon#10.
title: Pr92x L1T BMTF & uGMT 2017 fixes (tag v94.0 v95.3 v95.4 v94.1)
